hadith.text: Narrated Abu 'Abdur-Rahman:from 'Uthman bin 'Affan that the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said: "The best of you is he who learns the Qur'an and teaches it." Abu 'Abdur-Rahman said: "So that is why I sit at this seat of mine." And he taught the Qur'an during the time of 'Uthman until Al-Hajjaj bin Yusuf came. (Sahih)
